summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of West Sixty-second Street, from Seventeenth Avenue Northwest to Twenty-sixth Avenue Northwest, all in the City of Seattle, by regrading, curbing and constructing concrete sidewalks and providing for the necessary surface drainage, in accordance with Resolution No. 1991 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
